oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Learners' corpus Šolar 1.0
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rozman, Tadeja
Stritar Kučuk, Mojca
Kosem, Iztok
Krek, Simon
Krapš Vodopivec, Irena
Arhar Holdt, Špela
Stabej, Marko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: developmental corpus
error annotation
student writing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Šolar consists of 2,703 texts written by students in Slovene secondary schools (age 15-19) and pupils in the 7th-9th grade of primary school (13-15), with a small percentage also from the 6th grade. School essays form the majority of the corpus (64.2%) while other material includes texts created during lessons, such as text recapitulations or descriptions, examples of formal applications etc. Part of the corpus is annotated with teachers' corrections using a custom system of labels.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Centre for Language Resources and Technologies, University of Ljubljana
